verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I’ve turned my back upon the world With all its idle pleasures, And set my heart on better things, On higher, holier treasures; No more its glitter and its glare, And vanity shall blind me; I’ve crossed the separating line, And left the world behind me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me! I’ve crossed the separating line, And left the world behind me.

verse.name: v2
c2
verse.lines: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me! I’ve passed in Christ from death to life, And left the world behind me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My soul shall ne’er return again Back to its former station For here alone is perfect peace, And rest from condemnation; I’ve made exchange of masters now, The vows of glory bind me, And once for all I’ve left the world, Yes, left the world behind me.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me! And once for all I’ve left the world, Yes, left the world behind me.

verse.name: v4
c4
verse.lines: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me! I’ve crossed the Red Sea of His death, And left the world behind me.
